description:
Use LLM to automatically analyze completed solve/research outputs and suggest tags, categories, and folder structures. Batch-apply organization rules to historical notebooks with one click.

**Rationale:** Users accumulate numerous notebooks over time, making retrieval difficult. Manual tagging is tedious and inconsistent. AI-powered auto-organization maintains searchable structure without ongoing manual curation.
title: Automatic Notebook Organization and Tagging
